channel.title: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]
channel.description: I have all the teleports go to where I want them and changed the text, but I don't know how to make it so i need runes to teleport. Delta based

item.title: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:7, topic:374007”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=469990.msg3436413#msg3436413 date=1292791682]
imma try that RIGHT NOW CUZ IF THIS WORKS THAT WULD BE SOOO KL and every1 can ignore me n go ya ya cool story

edit: yay it works! but at the triggertele (coords where i tele to) can i add misc.random(1,2, or 3 ect.)?
[/quote]

Yes, you can. It would be something like this:

c.triggerTele(3087+misc.random(1), 3491+misc.random(1), 0);

yea thats what i expected

Read full topic

item.source: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]

item.title: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:5, topic:374007”]Or you could add in clickingmost.java where the actual teleport is added, example:

case 4140: //home tele case 73100: case 50235: if(c.playerHasItem(563, 1) && c.playerHasItem(554, 1) && c.playerHasItem(556, 3)){ if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 25){ c.triggerTele(3087, 3491, 0); c.deleteItem(563, 1); c.deleteItem(554, 1); c.deleteItem(556, 3); } else c.sM("You need a magic level of 25 or better to cast this spell."); } else c.sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); break; [/quote]
imma try that RIGHT NOW CUZ IF THIS WORKS THAT WULD BE SOOO KL and every1 can ignore me n go ya ya cool story

edit: yay it works! but at the triggertele (coords where i tele to) can i add misc.random(1,2, or 3 ect.)?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]

item.title: How do i make it so you need runes? [Lock]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Or you could add in clickingmost.java where the actual teleport is added, example:

case 4140: //home tele
case 73100:
case 50235:
    if(c.playerHasItem(563, 1) && c.playerHasItem(554, 1) && c.playerHasItem(556, 3)){
            if (c.playerLevel[6] >= 25){
                c.triggerTele(3087, 3491, 0);
                c.deleteItem(563, 1);
                c.deleteItem(554, 1);
                c.deleteItem(556, 3);
            }  else
                c.sM("You need a magic level of 25 or better to cast this spell.");
    } else 
       c.sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell.");
break;

Read full topic
